Azure.ResourceManager.Foundations.CheckN.description: Possible reasons for a name not being available.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

name.description: The name of the resource for which availability needs to be checked.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates if the resource name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the given name is not available.

message.description: Detailed reason why the given name is available.

CommunicationServiceKeys.description: A class representing the access keys of a CommunicationService.

primaryConnectionString.description: CommunicationService connection string constructed via the primaryKey

secondaryConnectionString.description: CommunicationService connection string constructed via the secondaryKey

CommunicationServiceProperties.description: A class that describes the properties of the CommunicationService.

dataLocation.description: The location where the communication service stores its data at rest.

notificationHubId.description: Resource ID of an Azure Notification Hub linked to this resource.

version.description: Version of the CommunicationService resource. Probably you need the same or higher version of client SDKs.

immutableResourceId.description: The immutable resource Id of the communication service.

linkedDomains.description: List of email Domain resource Ids.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

identity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

linkedDomains.description: List of email Domain resource Ids.

DnsRecord.description: A class that represents a VerificationStatus record.

type.description: Type of the DNS record. Example: TXT

ttl.description: Represents an expiry time in seconds to represent how long this entry can be cached by the resolver, default = 3600sec.

DomainManagement.description: Describes how a Domains resource is being managed.

DomainProperties.description: A class that describes the properties of a Domains resource.

dataLocation.description: The location where the Domains resource data is stored at rest.

fromSenderDomain.description: P2 sender domain that is displayed to the email recipients [RFC 5322].

mailFromSenderDomain.description: P1 sender domain that is present on the email envelope [RFC 5321].

domainManagement.description: Describes how a Domains resource is being managed.

userEngagementTracking.description: Describes whether user engagement tracking is enabled or disabled.

KeyType.description: The keyType to regenerate. Must be either 'primary' or 'secondary'(case-insensitive).

LinkNotificationHubParameters.description: Description of an Azure Notification Hub to link to the communication service

resourceId.description: The resource ID of the notification hub

connectionString.description: Connection string for the notification hub

LinkedNotificationHub.description: A notification hub that has been linked to the communication service

resourceId.description: The resource ID of the notification hub

ManagedServiceIdentityType.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

NameAvailabilityParameters.description: Data POST-ed to the nameAvailability action

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the resource. Unknown is the default state for Communication Services.

RegenerateKeyParameters.description: Parameters describes the request to regenerate access keys

keyType.description: The keyType to regenerate. Must be either 'primary' or 'secondary'(case-insensitive).

Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

SenderUsernameProperties.description: A class that describes the properties of a SenderUsername resource.

dataLocation.description: The location where the SenderUsername resource data is stored at rest.

username.description: A sender senderUsername to be used when sending emails.

displayName.description: The display name for the senderUsername.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the resource. Unknown is the default state for Communication Services.

properties.description: The properties of a SenderUsername resource.

value.description: The SenderUsernameResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SuppressionListAddressProperties.description: A class that describes the properties of a SuppressionListAddress resource.

firstName.description: The first name of the email recipient.

lastName.description: The last name of the email recipient.

notes.description: An optional property to provide contextual notes or a description for an address.

lastModified.description: The date the address was last updated in a suppression list.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SuppressionListProperties.description: A class that describes the properties of a SuppressionList resource.

listName.description: The the name of the suppression list. This value must match one of the valid sender usernames of the sending domain.

lastUpdatedTimeStamp.description: The date the resource was last updated.

createdTimeStamp.description: The date the resource was created.

dataLocation.description: The location where the SuppressionListAddress data is stored at rest. This value is inherited from the parent Domains resource.

SuppressionListResource.description: A class representing a SuppressionList resource.

properties.description: The properties of a SuppressionList resource.

SuppressionListResourceListResult.description: The response of a SuppressionListResource list operation.

value.description: The SuppressionListResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

tags.description: Tags of the service which is a list of key value pairs that describe the resource.
